body_html:
This first two commits here are ATen changes that are equivalent to zdevito/ATen#74 -- I'm just including them here to get valid test output and to show the full issue; we'll actually merge this by first updating ATen and then having the third commit by itself.

Outside of ATen, this basically involves supporting:

  1. TensorList arguments in derivatives.yaml
  2. sizes(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. collection of sizes of a TensorList along a dimension)
  3. size(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. a single dimension size)
  4. torch.cat and narrow as double-backwards supporting functions.

sizes(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. collection of sizes of a TensorList along a dimension)
size(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. a single dimension size)
torch.cat and narrow as double-backwards supporting functions.
body:
This first two commits here are ATen changes that are equivalent to https://github.com/zdevito/ATen/pull/74 -- I'm just including them here to get valid test output and to show the full issue; we'll actually merge this by first updating ATen and then having the third commit by itself.

Outside of ATen, this basically involves supporting:
1) TensorList arguments in derivatives.yaml
2) sizes(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. collection of sizes of a TensorList along a dimension)
3) size(argument) in derivatives.yaml (e.g. a single dimension size)
4) torch.cat and narrow as double-backwards supporting functions.
